comments: companyTemplateDirectory points to the template directory within 'companies' to watch for changes
wiredepStylesheet is the main stylesheet that contains the wiredep bower comments

main.js.comments: This is the project's basic JS file, all self-written JS should go here.

libs.js.comments: We keep all vendor-specific JS (including all Bower imports) in it's own JS file here

angularlib.js.comments: We keep all angular-specific JS (including all Bower imports) in it's own JS file here

main.css.comments: SCSS can be included from bower_components. If you really need more complex imports, read this: https://github.com/roots/sage/issues/1313#issuecomment-73735184
